languages.text: {n}Мастер дисциплины сурово смеривает ремонтника взглядом.{/n} "Оружие — сдать. Об увиденном — молчать". {n}Слова с трудом пробиваются сквозь сжатые губы:{/n} "Ваше содействие блюстителям будет оценено".

traits.locale_text: {n}Мастер дисциплины сурово смеривает ремонтника взглядом.{/n} "Оружие — сдать. Об увиденном — молчать". {n}Слова с трудом пробиваются сквозь сжатые губы:{/n} "Ваше содействие блюстителям будет оценено".

languages.text: {n}The Master-at-Arms regards the infernus sternly.{/n} "The weapon — hand it over. What you saw — keep it to yourself." {n}She forces out the words through clenched teeth:{/n} "Your cooperation with the enforcers will be noted."
languages.original_text: {n}Мастер дисциплины сурово смеривает ремонтника взглядом.{/n} "Оружие — сдать. Об увиденном — молчать". {n}Слова с трудом пробиваются сквозь сжатые губы:{/n} "Ваше содействие блюстителям будет оценено".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms regards the infernus sternly.{/n} "Hand over the weapon. And not a word about what you've seen." {n}She forces the words through her clenched teeth:{/n} "Your cooperation with the enforcers will be noted."

{n}The Master-at-Arms regards the infernus sternly.{/n} "Hand over the weapon. And not a word about what you've seen." {n}She forces the words through her clenched teeth:{/n} "Your cooperation with the enforcers will be noted."

{n}The Master-at-Arms regards the infernus sternly.{/n} "Hand over the weapon. And not a word about what you've seen." {n}She forces the words through her clenched teeth:{/n} "Your cooperation with the enforcers will be noted."

{n}The Master-at-Arms regards the infernus sternly.{/n} "Hand over the weapon. And not a word about what you've seen." {n}She forces the words through her clenched teeth:{/n} "Your cooperation with the enforcers will be noted."

{n}The Master-at-Arms regards the infernus sternly.{/n} "The weapon — hand it over. What you saw — keep it to yourself." {n}She forces out the words through clenched teeth:{/n} "Your cooperation with the enforcers will be noted."

{n}The Master-at-Arms regards the infernus sternly.{/n} "The weapon — hand it over. What you saw — keep it to yourself." {n}She forces out the words through clenched teeth:{/n} "Your cooperation with the enforcers will be noted."

{n}The Master-at-Arms regards the infernus sternly.{/n} "The weapon — hand it over. What you saw — keep it to yourself." {n}She forces out the words through clenched teeth:{/n} "Your cooperation with the enforcers will be noted."

languages.text: {n}La maestra de armas se dirige al infernus con severidad.{/n} «Entregue el arma. Y no le cuente a nadie lo que ha visto aquí». {n}Escupe las palabras entre sus dientes apretados:{/n} «No olvidaremos su cooperación».
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms regards the infernus sternly.{/n} "The weapon — hand it over. What you saw — keep it to yourself." {n}She forces out the words through clenched teeth:{/n} "Your cooperation with the enforcers will be noted."

traits.locale_text: {n}La maestra de armas se dirige al infernus con severidad.{/n} «Entregue el arma. Y no le cuente a nadie lo que ha visto aquí». {n}Escupe las palabras entre sus dientes apretados:{/n} «No olvidaremos su cooperación».

languages.text: {n}マスター・アット・アームズが、インフェルヌスをキッと睨みつける。{/n}「その武器…それを渡せ。見たことは…一言も口にするな」{n}彼女は歯を食いしばって、言葉を絞り出す。{/n}「エンフォーサーへの協力については覚えておこう」
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms regards the infernus sternly.{/n} "The weapon — hand it over. What you saw — keep it to yourself." {n}She forces out the words through clenched teeth:{/n} "Your cooperation with the enforcers will be noted."

traits.locale_text: {n}マスター・アット・アームズが、インフェルヌスをキッと睨みつける。{/n}「その武器…それを渡せ。見たことは…一言も口にするな」{n}彼女は歯を食いしばって、言葉を絞り出す。{/n}「エンフォーサーへの協力については覚えておこう」

languages.text: {n}戒律大师严厉地注视着那位船员。{/n}“武器交出来，看到的事情一个字都不准说出去。”{n}随后，她咬牙切齿地补充了一句。{/n}“你对执法者的合作态度将会被记录在案。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms regards the infernus sternly.{/n} "The weapon — hand it over. What you saw — keep it to yourself." {n}She forces out the words through clenched teeth:{/n} "Your cooperation with the enforcers will be noted."

traits.locale_text: {n}戒律大师严厉地注视着那位船员。{/n}“武器交出来，看到的事情一个字都不准说出去。”{n}随后，她咬牙切齿地补充了一句。{/n}“你对执法者的合作态度将会被记录在案。”

languages.text: {n}Die Waffenmeisterin sieht den Infernus streng an.{/n} "Die Waffe ... gebt sie mir. Was Ihr gesehen habt ... behaltet Ihr für Euch." {n}Sie presst die Worte durch zusammengebissene Zähne hervor:{/n} "Eure Kooperation mit Enforcern wird vermerkt."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms regards the infernus sternly.{/n} "The weapon — hand it over. What you saw — keep it to yourself." {n}She forces out the words through clenched teeth:{/n} "Your cooperation with the enforcers will be noted."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Waffenmeisterin sieht den Infernus streng an.{/n} "Die Waffe ... gebt sie mir. Was Ihr gesehen habt ... behaltet Ihr für Euch." {n}Sie presst die Worte durch zusammengebissene Zähne hervor:{/n} "Eure Kooperation mit Enforcern wird vermerkt."

languages.text: {n}La capitaine d'armes adresse un regard sévère à l'infernus.{/n} « Vous allez me remettre cette arme et vous allez garder pour vous ce que vous avez vu. » {n}Elle siffle à travers ses dents serrées :{/n} « Nous prenons bonne note de votre coopération avec les prévôts. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms regards the infernus sternly.{/n} "The weapon — hand it over. What you saw — keep it to yourself." {n}She forces out the words through clenched teeth:{/n} "Your cooperation with the enforcers will be noted."

traits.locale_text: {n}La capitaine d'armes adresse un regard sévère à l'infernus.{/n} « Vous allez me remettre cette arme et vous allez garder pour vous ce que vous avez vu. » {n}Elle siffle à travers ses dents serrées :{/n} « Nous prenons bonne note de votre coopération avec les prévôts. »

languages.text: {n}Silahtar, itfa üstadına sert bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Silah... Ver onu bana. Her ne gördüysen bunu kendine sakla." {n}Sıktığı dişlerinin arasından sözcükler zorla çıkıyor.{/n} "İnfazcılarla iş birliğin dikkate alınacak."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master-at-Arms regards the infernus sternly.{/n} "The weapon — hand it over. What you saw — keep it to yourself." {n}She forces out the words through clenched teeth:{/n} "Your cooperation with the enforcers will be noted."
